events.message: I am submitting a claim for my car after it was involved in a collision last night near downtown.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under auto accident based on the initial description provided.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to assist you throughout the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and have started processing it for your car accident case.
Please provide the police report, pictures of the vehicle damage, and any witness statements related to the accident.
The requested documents including the accident report and photos of the damaged car have been uploaded for review.
Our investigation team has begun examining the circumstances surrounding your vehicle collision.
The investigation is complete and all evidence has been reviewed for your car accident claim.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the extent of damage and liability from the collision.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and taken note of your concerns.
Your claim for the auto accident has been approved after considering all submitted documentation and investigation results.
The settlement payment has been issued to your designated account following claim approval.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful payment and resolution of the case.
